Wanderer's Cap.name: Wanderer's Cap
Wanderer's Cap.description: The preferred headgear of those who prefer the road less traveled. A slight boost to agility keeps you one step ahead of trouble.

Wanderer's Tonic.name: Wanderer's Tonic
Wanderer's Tonic.description: A brew concocted from the wild herbs of the wilderness. A small sip boosts your health, allowing you to wander a bit farther.

Wanderer's Ring.name: Wanderer's Ring
Wanderer's Ring.description: A simple band worn by those who traverse the wilderness. A slight boost to recovery keeps your journey from being cut short.

Wanderer's Clothes.name: Wanderer's Clothes
Wanderer's Clothes.description: Garments made for the open road. A small increase to defence lets you brush off minor threats with ease.

Wanderer's Pebble.name: Wanderer's Pebble
Wanderer's Pebble.description: A small stone carried for good luck. Gives a small boost to attack damage, helping you fend off any unfriendly encounters.

Navigator's Helmet.name: Navigator's Helmet
Navigator's Helmet.description: A helmet designed for cosmic exploration. Provides a substantial boost to defence, allowing you to navigate through stellar challenges.

Navigator's Elixir.name: Navigator's Elixir
Navigator's Elixir.description: An elixir brewed from rare celestial herbs. Offers a noticeable increase in health, keeping your vitality high amid the starry expanse.

Navigator's Ring.name: Navigator's Ring
Navigator's Ring.description: A band set with a fragment of a shooting star. Grants a significant increase to recovery, helping you regain strength more quickly in your celestial journey.

Navigator's Garb.name: Navigator's Garb
Navigator's Garb.description: A suit tailored for interstellar exploration. Provides a substantial boost to agility, allowing for nimble navigation through the cosmos.

Navigator's Amulet.name: Navigator's Amulet
Navigator's Amulet.description: A celestial charm housing the essence of a nebula. Provides a substantial increase to attack damage, turning the might of the cosmos to your advantage.

Mystic's Arcane Hat.name: Mystic's Arcane Hat
Mystic's Arcane Hat.description: Imbued with the knowledge of the universe, this hat boosts your Aspect Mastery, connecting your thoughts with the elements.

Mystic's Starlight Robe.name: Mystic's Starlight Robe
Mystic's Starlight Robe.description: This robe amplifies your defensive abilities, enveloping you in a protective aura that diminishes the effect of incoming attacks.

Mystic's Lunar Amulet.name: Mystic's Lunar Amulet
Mystic's Lunar Amulet.description: This ring enhances your recovery speed, drawing upon the energy of the cosmos to replenish your strength.

Mystic's Astral Codex.name: Mystic's Astral Codex
Mystic's Astral Codex.description: This codex significantly increases your attack damage, transmuting your energy into a blast of astral power.
